content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ XDR for Cloud usage graph now available August 26, 2024—Cloud Accounts now features a detailed graph displaying your current and historical data ingestion for XDR for Cloud, enabling you to track the volume of data analyzed. To view the usage graph, go to Cloud Security → Cloud Accounts and click Credit Usage. Cloud Security → Cloud Accounts © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: XDR for Cloud usage graph now available
